translation_info.title: KAKAIYARI NIUKIEYA XAPAYARI WIXARIKAKI
translation_info.license: Creative Commons License: Attribution-Noncommercial-No Derivative Works (CC BY-NC-ND 4.0)

verses.text: 'Iki kanihikitini ti'ikitame niukieya, Rawiri nu'aya, Kerutsareme miti'aitametikai[cite: 4654, 4655].
Mipai kanaineni ti'ikitame [cite: 4656]: -Tita tixaiti temite'erie [cite: 4657], tixaiti pikatihiki [cite: 4658], naiti tixaiti pikatihiki[cite: 4659].
¿Ketita ra'iwa tewi [cite: 4660], waikawa tiyurieneti 'iki tukaritsie timieme[cite: 4661]?
Hipati mepitakukuwe [cite: 4661], hipatita mepitinunuiwa [cite: 4661], matsi kwie yaxeikia kani'aneni[cite: 4661].
Tau panatineika meta pakayuyuipike [cite: 4662], miki yumexiitiati yuhuyeripa tawarita yu'itima manatineniki[cite: 4663].
Tatsutia kaniu'ekani [cite: 4664], tatsierieta hekututuketi [cite: 4665], tawarita hekwameki muku'ekaki yu'utima katihayewati kaniu'ekani[cite: 4666, 4667].

'Aki 'amipapa haa muhapane haramaratsie peukayuyuipike [cite: 4668, 4669], peru hatsuaku haramara pikatahine[cite: 4670]. Tawarita yu'utima kani'atiwani [cite: 4671], miki muhapaneniki 'axeikia[cite: 4672].
Waikawa pikwaniwe nemititaxataki matsi waikawa kemitiyiwe mitiutaxataki[cite: 4673]. Naka matsi waikawa mipai katineu'enamikini [cite: 4673], Meta hixite pika'uxiwe mitaniereniki[cite: 4673].
Meripaiti kemitiuyi mipaita katiniyimiki [cite: 4674, 4675]: ketita meripaiti mitiutiwewiya naitiri katinihekiaka [cite: 4679], tawari tihekwati pitiumawe 'ena muyuawitia[cite: 4680].
Xewiti piyiwe mipai mutayini [cite: 4681]: <<Neuxei 'iki kanihekwanike»[cite: 4682]. Matsi meripaiti katinixuawekaitini yuheyemeki[cite: 4683],
tame 'akuxi tekatinunuiwawawekaku[cite: 4685]. Tame hiki hipame tepikawara'eriwa kememite'uyuri [cite: 4686, 4687, 4688], ta'utimata memitinunuiwa simepikatehetimani ketemiteyurie hiki[cite: 4689].
Ne, Ti'ikitame, Kerutsareme nepiti'aitametikai 'Ixaheritsixi watsata[cite: 4691, 4692, 4693, 4694].
Nepinewairi yanemiretimaniki kemiti'aneki 'ena kwiepa, mipai nepiretima Kakaiyari 'uximayatsika pitatsi'uku'eiriri waikawa haheteme tame yatemitekakineki hetsiena[cite: 4695].
Naime mipai nepiretima ketemiteyurie 'ena kwiepa, pikatiyupata 'eka muweiyani hepai kani'aneni[cite: 4696].
Titunime mutaxeurariya pikayiwe [cite: 4697], meta pikayiwe miti'iniataki kepaimeti meuyewetse[cite: 4698, 4700].

Merikite nepineti'iyaritia: <<Waikawa nepeukawe meta nepitimaiwe keyuri meripaiti te'aitamete Kerutsaremetsie, ne naimeki nepiyiwe nemititiwauniki netimaiweti waikawameki meta neheitimaitiyeikati[cite: 4701, 4702].
Ne yemeki nepineyetua netimaiweti nemayaniki, nekanimaikata mikayikihiawe meta mika'uka'iyari [cite: 4703], matsi miki 'eka manuku'axe hepai kani'aneni[cite: 4703].
Matsi puyuri, kepauka waikawa memitemaiwawe matsi waikawa kanixuaweni 'uximatiarika [cite: 4708, 4709], kepauka waikawa memitemate waikawa mepite'ukakukuine»[cite: 4710].

Merikite mipai nekatiniunehiawe: «Kamitsi nekatinita'iniatamiki naime nemuyutemawieritianiki 'aixia muti'aneki matsi waikawa tukari neminepitianiki»[cite: 4712]. Peru tsepa mipai nemitiuyuri tixaiti nepikatiukaxei[cite: 4713].
Mipai nepiretima yutemawierikaki purukuyaneni xeikia [cite: 4714], kemimatinake pe'uyeikati miki tixaiti pikatihiki[cite: 4714].

Mipaita nekatiniuyihiawe yanemiretimaniki winu nekananu'ieni [cite: 4715], mexi mipai neretimaiximekai, nepineyetua nemika'uka'iyarini hepai [cite: 4715], yanemiretimaniki tita 'aixia muti'ane tewi tikaxeiya kemitiyurieneki 'ena 'uyeikati 'ena kwiepa mexi'ayeniere[cite: 4715].
Waikawa mamariwaweme nekatiniutiwewieni [cite: 4716]: kii nepunetiwewiri [cite: 4716], meta kaxie haraweriyari nepexeiyakai[cite: 4716],
nehetsie timieme nekatini'uximayakaitini [cite: 4718], harawerita meta 'iteirite [cite: 4718], mana nekatiniuka'iteirita kiyexite yu'ikwaxi mexeiyatika[cite: 4718].
Yaxeikia putsu 'emeukatetewa nekaniutiwewieni waikawa kiyexi mana muxuawekai nemihatuiyaniki mitiwawereniki[cite: 4719].

Te'uximayatamete waikawa nepiwarexeiyakai 'ukitsi 'ukari [cite: 4721, 4723], meta waikawa wakaitsixi [cite: 4723], meta muxatsi meripaiti kiekatari te'aitamete Kerutsareme kememikateheuxeiyakai[cite: 4727, 4728].

Huru, pirata, piinite miraye'axe nepitiukuxeiri te'aitamete tiwapiinite meta kiekarite[cite: 4729]. Nepiwarexeiyakaita kwikamete 'ukitsi meta 'ukari [cite: 4730], waikawa nepinetemawiekai teiteri wahamatia [cite: 4730], nerexeiyati titaki tewi mitiyutatua mirexeiyaniki[cite: 4730].
Nematsi nemariweti nekanayani [cite: 4731], keyuri hipati meripaiti te'aitamete Kerutsareme miemete [cite: 4731], metatsiere yaxeikia nepitimaiwekai[cite: 4731].

Naime mipai nepitiuyuri kenemitiyurimikikai nekimana [cite: 4732], naime mipai nepitiuyuri keminetinakekai [cite: 4732], nepinekatemawi mipai netiuyurieka naime ne'uximayatsikaki[cite: 4732]. 'Ikiki xeikia waikawa ne'uximayatsika patia[cite: 4732].

Nepuyuti'iyaritia naimeki kenemitiuyuriekaiki [cite: 4734, 4735], ne'uximayatsikatsie waikawa nemitineti'uxitiaki neti'uximayati [cite: 4737], mipai nepiretima miki tixaiti pikatihikitikai [cite: 4737], xika 'eka pe'anukuweiya pepikahenuku'axe [cite: 4737], mipaita katinimatsiikini tixaiti pikatihiki 'atukaritsie timieme[cite: 4737]. Tixaiti kwiepa timieme tepikatehanutini [cite: 4738] nepeuyuti'eriexia[cite: 4739].
Merikitsi kenemitimaiwekaiki, meta mikayukihiaweki meta mika'uka'iyariki -¿ketiyiwe tawari ne'utima ti'aitame manukakeni yamitiyurieniki, nehepai pitiyurieni xeikia? [cite: 4740, 4741]
mipai nepiretima matsi waikawa peuyewetse mitimaiweniki keyuri mika'uka'iyarini [cite: 4745], hekiariya 'aixia mi'ane hepai keyuri yiriya[cite: 4745].

Kemi'ane mitimaiwe taneniereti kaniumieni [cite: 4746], peru kemi'ane 'atsimikatimate yiwipa kaniuyeikani[cite: 4747]. Peru tawari mipai nepiretima teyunaiti yaxeikia katatinitakwewieka temikwiniki[cite: 4748].
Merikite mipai nepitiunehiawixi: «Kamitsi mika'uka'iyari hepai nepitimini, ¿merikite titaki tiyunaki'erie kenemitimaiwe?» [cite: 4749] Mipai nepitiunehiawixi miki tixaiti pikatihikitikai[cite: 4749].
Mitimaiwe meta mikatimaiwe tima pikahaye'eriwa [cite: 4750], 'ureumieti yaxeikia memitemaiwawe mepitehatimaiyarieni [cite: 4751], metatsiere yaxeikia memitekwini memikatemaiwawe[cite: 4752, 4753].

Meriki netukari neputi'uxiwe'eri [cite: 4754], tsepa naimeki mipai nemitiyurienekai 'axapi'anekai nekimana[cite: 4754]. Yuriki naiti tixaiti pikaratia [cite: 4754], matsi 'eka 'utima pemunautsarimeni hepai kani'aneni[cite: 4754].
Yaxeikiata nepiti'uxiwe'eri kenemitiuyuri waikawa neti'uximayati 'ena ne'uyeikati [cite: 4755], nemiku'eiririeniki xeikia ne'utima manukakeni ti'aitati[cite: 4755].

'Atsipikatimatsiiki xika miki timaiwemiki yati pikatimaiweni[cite: 4756]. Matsi katiniyukapinitiamiki waikawa neyu'iyaritiati meta netimaiweti kenemitiuyuri 'ena ne'uyeikati[cite: 4756]. Miki meta tixaiti pikaratia[cite: 4756].
Waikawa neyu'iyaritiati nepitinehiawixi [cite: 4757], matsi 'ipai netixeiyati waikawa kenemitiuyuriekaiki 'ena kwiepa[cite: 4759, 4760],

matsi hipati memitemaiwaweki [cite: 4764], memite'uyemateki mekateni'uximayatakuni [cite: 4764], miki xeime memiyetuirieniki mikatiuta'uximayataxi hatsuaku hetsiemieme naimeki kememite'uyuri[cite: 4766, 4767]. Peru mikita tixaiti pikatihiki meta 'axapi'ane[cite: 4767].
Kamitsi, ¿tita ra'iwanikeyu tewi xika yutirikariyaki yianeni kemitiku'eriwa [cite: 4768], waikawa yu'iyaritiati tixaiti pikara'iwa 'ena muyuawitia[cite: 4768]?
Naime tukaritsie 'axakani'itiarieka tsikere tiuka'eniwati meta tikariki pika'uka'uxipiwe tiku'eriwati[cite: 4769, 4770]. Mikita yaxeikia tixai pikatihiki[cite: 4770].
Matsi tewitsie pitiumawe 'aixia ti'aneti 'ikwaiki xeikia 'iiyaki pi'ayumie yutemawieti yu'uximayatsikatsie[cite: 4771]. Mipai nepiretima mikita Kakaiyari hetsia kanayeneikani[cite: 4771],
kamitsi ¿kemi'ane piyiwe mitikwaniki meta muyutemawiekaki xika Kakaiyari hetsia katimiemetini[cite: 4772]?

Kakaiyari matsi mitimaiweniki meta meitimaitiyeikaniki meta muyutemawiekaki kaniyetuirieka kemi'ane miki minake miyetuirieniki [cite: 4773], matsi 'axamitiyuriene kanihayewani para miki mitixeirieniki miyetuirienikita kemi'anetsiere minaki'erie[cite: 4773].
Peru mikita 'axakani'aneni 'eka muweiyani hepai[cite: 4774].
Xexuime tukaritetsie pitika'iniaritika, tukari puxuawe naimetsie timieme kemitiuyurieni muyuawi hetia[cite: 4776].
Kepauka temitinunuiwa [cite: 4779], kepaukata temikwini [cite: 4779], kepauka mitiuka'iteirita [cite: 4779], kepaukata temiteka'uta[cite: 4779].
Kepauka mitiuyumieni [cite: 4780], kepaukata muwaranayexiriwani [cite: 4780], kepauka mitiuka'unaki [cite: 4780], kepaukata menukuketianiki[cite: 4780].
Kepauka mutatsuakaniki [cite: 4781], kepaukata mutanaweniki [cite: 4781], kepauka muyuhiwerieka [cite: 4782], kepaukata temawierika mexeiyani[cite: 4782].
Kepauka tetexi mutaxirieni [cite: 4783], kepaukata mititiki [cite: 4783], kepauka muyutapatikani [cite: 4784], kepaukata muyutateutiaxiani[cite: 4784].
Kepauka mitikuwauneni [cite: 4785], kepaukata mikatikuwauneni [cite: 4786], kepauka mutiuti'uta [cite: 4787], kepaukata mirexirieni[cite: 4788].
Kepauka mutiutatsana [cite: 4789], kepaukata mitiutawipa [cite: 4790], kepauka mika'utaniukani [cite: 4790], kepaukata mitikuxatani[cite: 4791].
Kepauka muyunaki'erietikani [cite: 4792], kepaukata mitiyuka'uxiwe'erieka [cite: 4793], kepauka mukuyaxatini [cite: 4794], kepaukata kayuwati memexeiyani[cite: 4795].
Tixaiti pikara'iwa tsepa kemi'ane waikawa tiyu'uxitiati miti'uximaya[cite: 4796, 4797].
Mipai nepitiniere Kakaiyari mipai pitiwarupitia hahetemeki [cite: 4801], tewi mipai muti'uximayakaki[cite: 4801].

Kakaiyari witsiti'aneme katiniunetiani [cite: 4802], mipai tewi katiniupitiani mipai mitiku'eriwaniki 'uxa'atiniwarie [cite: 4802], tsepa tewi mikaheitimaitiyeika Kakaiyari 'uximayatsikaya miki kemitiyuriene matiari paiti meta 'imatirieka[cite: 4802].
Ne nepitimate tewitsie puxuawe xeikia [cite: 4803], temawierika meta 'aixia mitiyurieneki mexi'ayeyuri[cite: 4803].
Mipaita nepitimate kename Kakaiyari 'imikierieya hiki [cite: 4804], tewi mitikwakaki miti'iekaki [cite: 4804], meta naime yu'uximayatsikatsie timieme mira'ininiatani[cite: 4804].

Yaxeikiata mipai nepitimate naime Kakaiyari mitiunetia yuheyemeki katiniwiyani [cite: 4805], pikayiwe temitaniitianiki meta temenakaxirieniki [cite: 4805], Kakaiyari mipai katiniuyurieni temimakaxeniki[cite: 4805].
Hiki tita mitixuawe, katinixuawekaitiniri [cite: 4806], ketitamitinenikekai, 'ariri katinixuaweni[cite: 4807]. Kakaiyari mipai katiniyurieneni 'ixatsieya yamireuyuhaneniki[cite: 4807].

Matsi tawari tixaiti nekatinixeiyanita tukaritsie [cite: 4808]: 'axakatiniyianeni hakewa 'iki meta'iwawiyarienitsie [cite: 4809], hakewa miheitserie mekuxaxatsiwatsie 'axamiti'ane kanixuaweni[cite: 4811].

Meriki mipaita nepitiu'eri: «Kakaiyari heitserie mexeiya meta 'axamitiuka'iyari kaniwaranutaxiriemiki [cite: 4812], muxuaweki tukarite yamitiuyurieniki naimeki meta hakewa yamireyurieniki»[cite: 4812].

Meta mipai nepitiu'eri teiteri yeuta meta 'axateyuruwamete memukateukiexia wahepaitsita [cite: 4816, 4817, 4818]: <<<Kakaiyari kaniwa'iniataneni [cite: 4819], miki mipai memiteheyutimaniki [cite: 4820] kename memite'u'uwa wahepai me'anene[cite: 4822, 4824].

Teiteri yeutari wahepai mekatenitakukuweni [cite: 4823, 4825], yaxeikia mekatenita'ikwewani metakukuweti yuxexuiti [cite: 4825], yaxeikia kani'aneneni yunaiti kememite'ayeyuyuri [cite: 4825], 'ayumieme tewi pikawe'eme tewaxi wahetsiemieme[cite: 4825]. Yuriki naiti tixaiti pikarayani[cite: 4826],
'Axeikia naiti katiniyemieni[cite: 4827]. >>Naiti tumuanaritsie mitiyetia [cite: 4828], tumuanaritsie katininuamiki[cite: 4829].
>>¿Kemi'ane pitimate xika tewi 'iyarieya 'anutiyeikani 'ameutitewatsie [cite: 4830], meta yeutari wa'iyari xika 'anukayeikani, 'emeukatewatsie kwiepa?>>> [cite: 4830]

Mipai nepiretima, tewi hetsie puxuawe xeikia [cite: 4831], yu'uximayatsikatsie mitiwiyaniki miki hetsiena pitiunakixi[cite: 4831]. Kamitsi, xewiti pumawe xeime mipai mititahiaweki kemitiyiniki[cite: 4831].

Merikite neniune'iwiyata 'iki tukaritsie waikawa kememite'uka'eniwakai[cite: 4834]. Nekaniwaruxeiya 'axamemute'anuyehu me'utitsuaname [cite: 4834], xewiti pumawekai miwanitianiki [cite: 4834], tirikariya memexeiya mekaniwa'uximatiakaitini [cite: 4834], pumawekai kemi'ane muwanitiani[cite: 4835].
Mipai nepitiunehiawixi[cite: 4836]. Matsi waikawa mepuyutemamawie kemi'ane memukwiri [cite: 4836], keyuri memayeneniere[cite: 4836],
matsi mekaniyutemamawieka kemi'ane memikatinunuiwawe 'akuxi [cite: 4839, 4840], 'atsimemikatemateki ketita 'axamiti'ane 'ena kwiepa[cite: 4842].

Meta nekaniuniere 'aixia 'aneme yu'uximayatsikaki yutukaritsie mekaniwaranutanieritiwani 'axamemitewakihiawe[cite: 4843]. Mikita yaxeikia tixaiti pikarayani [cite: 4843], 'eka pemuweiyani hepai kani'aneni[cite: 4843].
'Atsimikatimate yutapa kanawieka [cite: 4844], ya'aneti haakaki kwikaniyianeni[cite: 4845].

Matsi 'aixia pi'ane kayuwati miti'uximayaka 'etsiwa mirexeiyaniki [cite: 4846, 4847], keyuri waikawa tikumaiwati mirexeiyaniki [cite: 4851] xika waikawa pikarayeika [cite: 4856], waikawa tikumaiwani [cite: 4852] tixaiti karexeiyati[cite: 4854].
Teyuxewiti matsi tekanitirikaiyeni[cite: 4859]. Xaitsie tawari tixaiti mikatihikitsie nekanine'iwiya 'ena kwiepa[cite: 4860]:

tewi xeime nekaniuxeiya yuxaitame 'uyeikame [cite: 4861], tiri kawarexeiyame meta yu'iwama [cite: 4861], peru pikatihayewakai waikawameki yu'iyaritiati yu'uximayatsikaki [cite: 4861], hatsuaku mipai pikatiuyuhiawixi waikawa kemirexeiyakaiki «¿Kamitsi kemi'ane rahetsiemieme ne waikawa nepiti'uximaya, 'aixia nemitiyurieniki nekayuwairiyati?» mipai katiniuyuhiawe[cite: 4861]. Mikita yaxeikia tixaiti pikatihiki kenemitiune'uxitia waikawa[cite: 4862].
'Aixia matsi kani'aneni yuhutati keyuri yuxewiti [cite: 4863], miki matsi waikawa mekanitatseirikuni kememiteyu'uxitia[cite: 4862].
Xika xewiti 'atiweni, xewiti kanenukuhanimiki[cite: 4866]. Matsi xia'ui kemi'ane matiweni [cite: 4867], mikaheixeiya kemi'ane menukuhana[cite: 4868].
Yuhutati xika me'uheni [cite: 4869], mekaniyuxiriyani [cite: 4870], matsi yuxaita ¿kehepai tiyutaxiriya[cite: 4871]?
Yuxaitame kana'iwariemiki [cite: 4872], matsi yuhutati mekaniyuparewieka[cite: 4873]. Kaunari xika haikani [cite: 4874] yapauka pika'anutekieni[cite: 4875].
'Aixia matsi kani'aneni temaiki tixaiti karexeiyati peru xika timaiweni [cite: 4877, 4878], keyuri ti'aitame meripai mieme 'atsimikatimate [cite: 4879, 4880, 4881], kayi'ixatsitiariniati[cite: 4882].
Tsepaneti 'anutahiiyame wayeyame 'uwenitsie maya [cite: 4885], yatini tixaiti karexeiyati 'utinuiwame ti'aitame mayaniki[cite: 4885],
ne mipai nepitimate matsi 'iki temaiki waikawa teiteri mekaniparewieka [cite: 4886], manukakeni ti'aitametiti[cite: 4886].

Peru tsepaneti teiteri memikayu'iniatsinia te'aitamete memiwaruweiya [cite: 4887], 'arike memi'axe [cite: 4887], yumiiretita mekayutemamawieti mekaniyuhayewani hetsienamieme[cite: 4889, 4890]. Mikita yaxeikia tixaiti pikatihiki [cite: 4891], 'eka manuku'axe hepai pi'ane[cite: 4892].

Kepauka Kakaiyari kiita pemeutahani [cite: 4895], pe'a'iwiyati kepemitiuyeikaki kene'enieka keyuri pe'iyetuirienike mawari 'atsimemikatemate wahepai [cite: 4895, 4899], miki 'axameteyuriekame mepikayu'erie[cite: 4899].

Pepika'amexiitiaka [cite: 4900], 'ateniki meta kepemitiku'eriwaki [cite: 4901], pe'ahiritiati Kakaiyari hixie xeiniukiyariki [cite: 4901], miki muyuawitsie kanakakani 'ekita kwiepa pekaniuyeikani[cite: 4902, 4903]. 'Ayumieme 'aniuki kenexewiriyani[cite: 4906].
Kemi'ane waikawa muyu'iyaritia katinika'eniwani 'axati'aneme tiheiniti [cite: 4907, 4908], kemi'aneta waikawa mutaniuka yaki xeikia katinikuxatani[cite: 4909, 4910].

Kepauka Kakaiyari hetsia tixaitiki pemiti'ahiritia [cite: 4911, 4912], matsi 'apepikareutewini [cite: 4914] Kakaiyari [cite: 4915] yapemitikayaniki [cite: 4913], matsi pikayutemawie yamemikatekahu wahetsiemieme[cite: 4916, 4917]. Kenaye'atia kepemutayiki[cite: 4917]:
Matsi 'aixia kani'aneni xika tixaitiki katiyuhiritiaka [cite: 4919], mipai tiuyurieme kapa kaheye'atianiki[cite: 4920].

'Ateni pepikapitiaka kapa 'axapetiuyurieniki [cite: 4921], yapepikahaineni Kakaiyari tupirieya hixie [cite: 4921], kename yapekara'eriwameki petiuyuri[cite: 4921]. ¿Titayari matsi Kakaiyari petihaxiatia miyape'utaiti naime mitika'unaki 'a'uximayatsika[cite: 4922]?

Matsi waikawa xikaxuaweni tixaiti mikatihiki [cite: 4923], heinitsi 'axa'aneneti tiyu'uximatiwati [cite: 4923], yakixeikia waikawa mayeniuweniki [cite: 4923], 'eki matsi Kakaiyari kenayemakaxeni[cite: 4923]. Tsepa pemixiku tixaiti pikatihiki[cite: 4924].

Xika xeime kwieyaritsie pewaruxeiya mewananaimakame tixaiti memikatehexeiya [cite: 4925], meta teiteri mekawapitiati heitserie memexeiya [cite: 4929], mikiki pepikahixiyaka [cite: 4929], kemi'ane waikawa muwe'eme xewiti matsi waikawa we'emetiti kanixeiyani [cite: 4929], meta waheima matsi xewiti mariweti kaniwaxeiyani[cite: 4929].
Kamitsi 'iki naimeki tixaiti pikatixuawe 'aixia miti'ane 'iki kwieyaritsie [cite: 4930], miraka'etsitiretsieri miti'iwiyani peuyewetse ti'aitame[cite: 4930].

Tumini kemi'ane minakie'erie [cite: 4931], pikatahiniwe tuminiki[cite: 4931]. Kemi'ane waikawa mirexeiyaniki mirexuawe [cite: 4932], miyiane matsi waikawa pireuyehiwa[cite: 4931]. Mikita yaxeikia tixaiti pikatihiki[cite: 4931].
Hakewa waikawa kananuyuhayewanita mitixitianiki [cite: 4933], ¿ketita 'aixia miti'ane kamitsi tiutixuaweriyaxi kutsiyarieya 'ixeiyaka xeikia[cite: 4934]?

Ti'uximayatame 'aixia 'anemeki kaniukakukutsuni [cite: 4935], heiwa waikawa tiutikwa'ati heiwa 'etsiwa xeikia[cite: 4935]. Mixikuta waikawa mirexeiyaki piiniteya pika'ipitia 'aixia 'iyari mikutsuniki[cite: 4935].
Hiki tukaritsie nepitixeiya waikawa 'axamiti'ane [cite: 4936]: waikawa tumini muti'utaki xeikia kemi'ane miti'utaxi mu'uximatiarieniki[cite: 4936],
meta miki piinitiarika pireuyewautse hau'erieti xika petita'uximayatsitiani[cite: 4937]. Miki kutsiyarieya xika heiwa yuniwe hexeiyati 'ayani tixaitiri pikarexeiyani miku'eiririeniki[cite: 4937].

Ke'aneti mutinuiwaxi yumaamatsie [cite: 4938], mipaita 'aneti kaniyemieni [cite: 4938]: maweti kemitinua 'ena kwiepa [cite: 4938], tixaiti pikaranutini waikawa yu'uximayatsikatsie timieme[cite: 4938].
Miki matsi mari'itiarika kanihikitini [cite: 4939]: ke'aneti minua tewi mipai 'anetita kaniyemieni[cite: 4939]. ¿Ketitayari kamitsi waikawa rexeiyani tixaiti karayanikeyu[cite: 4943]?
'Imatirieka kepaimexia muyeikani yiwipa katinikwakamiki [cite: 4944], meta waikawa 'uximatiarieti katinikuyekamiki 'ayu'eriyati[cite: 4944].

'Iki kanihikitini kenemiretima: 'iki tukaritsie 'aixia kani'aneni matsi mitiutikwa'ani miranuye'eni [cite: 4944], ketipaimeme pemirexeiyaki pe'atemawieti matsi ketinekwaka[cite: 4944]. Miki kanihikitini Kakaiyari mitatsiyetuiri [cite: 4945], miki tahetsie mitiunakixi pihiki[cite: 4945].

Matsi Kakaiyari kemi'ane mitiyetuirie waikawa mirexeiyaniki [cite: 4946], kaniyetuiriekata yu'uximayatsikatsie timieme mitikwakakita [cite: 4946], miki kanihikitini Kakaiyari kemitatimikwa teyuxexuime[cite: 4947].
Kakaiyari wa'iyaritsie kemitiwahiniya temawierikaki [cite: 4947], tewi yutukari 'etsiwa xeikia kaniku'eriwani[cite: 4947].
Xeimeta nekanixeiyani 'axati'aneme 'iki tukaritsie teiteri watsata[cite: 4950, 4951]:

Kakaiyari hipame kaniwapitiaka waikawa memitehexeiyaniki [cite: 4953, 4954] meta tixaiti 'aixia memitexeiyariekaki [cite: 4956], meta hipameta pita piwapitia memitetikwaniki miki naime[cite: 4957]. 'Ikita tixaiti pikatihiki 'axamiti'ane[cite: 4957].

Tewi xika warexeiyani xeitsienituyari yuniwema [cite: 4958], meta miixa wiyari 'uyeikati [cite: 4958], tsepa kepaimexia muyeikani xika kayukatemawiwani 'aixia miti'aneki [cite: 4958], meta xewiti ka'ikateuku [cite: 4958], matsi 'aixia kani'aneni nunutsi mitinuiwa mukiti keyuri miki[cite: 4962].
Kamitsi miki nunutsi tixaiti pikaratia [cite: 4963], petia [cite: 4964], yiwipa puyuhayewa yiriyatsata kemititewakai[cite: 4963].
Hatsuaku tau pikaxeiya meta tixaiti pikaretimani [cite: 4965], matsi miki kayuwati hexeiyati kanayeimiki keyuri miki tewi[cite: 4965],
tsepa huta miriyari wiyari 'amuyeikani [cite: 4966], 'aixia miti'ane yakatiyurieneti[cite: 4966]. Matsi teyunaiti 'axeikia tekanekikani[cite: 4966].
Tewi waikawa katini'uximayaka mitikwakaki [cite: 4967], matsi hatsuaku pikatahuxani kimana[cite: 4967].
¿Mitimaiwe waikawa matsi kerexeiya keyuri mikatimaiwe[cite: 4968]? ¿Ketitari ra'iwakeyu tixaiti mikarexeiya, yutukari hetsiemieme miyiweniki[cite: 4968]?
Matsi tita mitiyuhekia 'aixia kani'aneni keyuri tikuwauneti[cite: 4969]. Mikita tixaiti pikatihiki [cite: 4969], 'eka muweiyani hepai kani'aneni[cite: 4969].

Ketita hiki mitixuawe 'ari kaneixeiyakaitiniri [cite: 4970] kemititewa [cite: 4971], yakatinimatsiikini tita mitihiki [cite: 4972]: tewititi[cite: 4972]. Xewiti muyutamieni pikayiwe xeime waikawa mitirikaiye hamatia[cite: 4973, 4974].
Niuki waikawa mekananutiyayatsani [cite: 4975], matsi tixaiti pikatihiki[cite: 4975].

'Atsitepikatemate, ketita matsi 'aixia miti'ane tahetsiemieme[cite: 4977]. Tixaiti pikatihiki yapaimexia xeikia mayeyurini 'etiri hepai xeikia yapauka makumawere[cite: 4977]. ¿Kemi'ane piyiwe yamititahiaweki tukarieya hepaitsita, kemitiyini 'arike miyuke[cite: 4978]?
Matsi tewi 'aixia peketixeiyarieka [cite: 4984], keyuri witsipe'u'iati[cite: 4985].

'Aixia matsi kani'aneni miki makateukienitsie pemumie [cite: 4988], keyuri 'ixiararipa[cite: 4990]. Temikwiniki teyunaime kanimiemetini [cite: 4991, 4992], memayeneniereta matsi mipai meketemaika[cite: 4993].
Teiteri tahetsie mekteylerieka mutanaweni [cite: 4995, 4996], kaneuyeweka kananakanutuixieka yuhixie [cite: 4997, 4998], matsi 'aixia kaniyurieka 'iyarieya[cite: 4999, 5000].
Mitimaiwe kaniku'eriwani kepauka mimini [cite: 5001], matsi 'atsimikatimate kaniyu'iyaritiaka xeikia kemitiyurieneki[cite: 5003, 5004].
Matsi 'aixia kani'aneni miratate'aniki [cite: 5007, 5008], mitimaiwe keyuri 'atsimikatimate niukieya tsi'aneneme 'enieti[cite: 5010, 5011].
Tixaiti pikatihiki 'atsimikatimate kemitikuxata [cite: 5012], mipai xeikia katinimatsiikini [cite: 5012], xuya xarita matikateni hepai[cite: 5012]. Mikita tixaiti pikatihiki[cite: 5013].
Mitimaiwe nanaimarikaki katimaiweti kanayeimiki [cite: 5015, 5017], tuminiki yu'iyari kanikwiemaka[cite: 5018].
Matsi 'aixia kani'aneni tixaiti mireutipareki [cite: 5019], keyuri titsutiarieti[cite: 5020]. Matsi 'aixia kani'aneni waikawa mitiuka'eniwaniki [cite: 5023, 5025], keyuri yu'ariwieti[cite: 5024].
Haxiaki xeikia pepika'ayeweni [cite: 5028], matsi miki 'atsimikatimate kani'iyarieyatini[cite: 5030].
Mipai pepikahaineni kename meripaiti 'aixia metiyuriekai[cite: 5030]. Miki kememutiyuane memitemaiwawe wahetsia pikamieme[cite: 5030].
'Aixia kani'aneni pemitimaiweniki tita 'aixia miti'ane hepaitsita [cite: 5031], hiki memu'uwa wahetsie 'aixia miti'aneniki[cite: 5031].

Pekaniyiweni mitimaiweniki 'etiriyayatsie pemuyeikaniki [cite: 5032] metatsiere tumini 'etiriyariyatsie [cite: 5032], matsi mitimaiweniki mi'ayumieme tukari kaniwapitiamiki kemi'ane memeixeiyani[cite: 5032].
Kakaiyari 'uximayatsikaya keneuxeiya [cite: 5033]: ¿kemi'ane piyiwe mitixeurariyaki tita miki mutiutitunaxi[cite: 5033]?

Kepauka 'aixia ti'aneme pemirexeiyani, kene'atemawieka [cite: 5034], matsi kepauka 'axati'aneme pemirexeiya, keneutimaixia 'uximayatsika naiti Kakaiyari hetsia kanayeneikani [cite: 5034], tewi 'atsimikatimateki ketita mitikaxeiya 'arike[cite: 5034].

Hiki tukaritsie nemuyeikakai tinaime nepitiuxei [cite: 5035]: teiteri 'aixia memite'u'uwa 'aixia miti'ane kaniwaka'unani [cite: 5035], teiteri 'axamemiteyurie 'axamiti'ane 'apitiwareuteritia[cite: 5035].
Kwinimieme 'aixia mitiyuriene pepika'a'erieka [cite: 5036], meta mitimaiwe pepika'ayuyeitiwani[cite: 5037, 5038]. ¿Matsi ketitayari peti'aka'unamiki 'akimana[cite: 5040, 5041]?
'Axapetiyurieneti pepika'ayuyeitiwani [cite: 5043], meta 'atsimikatimate hepai[cite: 5044]. ¿Ketitayari petimini kwitiwa[cite: 5045, 5047]?
'Aixia kani'aneni 'iki peha'eriwati [cite: 5049], peka'itatuayati tita pemirexeiya[cite: 5049]. Kakaiyari kemi'ane mayemakaxe [cite: 5049], miki naimetsie yakatinikamieni[cite: 5049].
Mitimaiweniki mi'ayumieme matsi mitimaiwe kanitirikariyani [cite: 5051, 5052], keyuri tamamata te'aitamete xeikiekariyaritsie[cite: 5053].
Xewiti pumawe 'ena kwiepa 'aixia 'aneti [cite: 5054], 'aixia tiyurieneti hatsuaku 'axakatiyuriweti[cite: 5054].
Pepikawa'enieka yunaime kememutiyuane [cite: 5055], mipai matsi peyianeti mati'uximayatsiriwame pepika'enieni kepauka 'ahepaitsita 'axamitayini[cite: 5055],
'ekita pekatinimaika [cite: 5056], heiwa miixa 'axapekaniutaineni hipame wahepaitsita[cite: 5056].

Naime 'iki 'aixia nekatiniuyurieni netimaiweti [cite: 5058], mipai nepitiku'eriwakai waikawa netimateti nepaneyeitiani [cite: 5058], peru mitimaiweniki mi'ayumieme ateewa paiti kaniyuhayewakaitini nehetsia[cite: 5058].
'Ateewa yemeki 'aheukatewakaku katiniyuhayewa naiti tita mitixuawe[cite: 5059]. ¿Kemi'ane piyiwe meitimaniki[cite: 5059]?

Merikite nekaninuani nemititamarieniki meta nemiretimaniki [cite: 5061], mitimaiweniki mi'ayumieme nemitixeiyaxianiki [cite: 5061], meta piinitiarika hetsiemieme [cite: 5062], 'ana mipai nepiretima 'atsimikatimate hikititi 'axakatiniyurieneni meta mika'uka'iyari kanirukuyaneni xeikia[cite: 5062].
¿Kemi'ane mitimaiwe hepai pi'ane[cite: 5079]? ¿Kemi'ane pimate kemitikuxata[cite: 5079]? Tewi mitimaiwe kanimatsiikini yuhixie meta kemitiyukanaki'erie kaniyutemawieka[cite: 5080].
Ne mipai nepaine: Ti'aitame keneu'enieka [cite: 5082], Kakaiyari yapemitiutahiawixiki[cite: 5082].
Pepika'amexiitiaka hixiena pemuwayeyaniki[cite: 5083]. Meta tita 'axamiti'ane pepikatiyexiatiaka miki mipai katiniyurieneni kemitinake[cite: 5083].
Ti'aitame niukieya kani'enierieka [cite: 5084], xewiti pikayiwe mita'iwawiyaki kemitiuyuri hepaitsita[cite: 5084].
Kemi'ane yamitikamie miki kemiti'aitia pikatikwinitiarieni tixaitiki[cite: 5088]. Yu'iyaritsie mitimaiwe katinimaika kehapai mitiyurieneni meta kepauka[cite: 5089].
Kaniyuritini teyunaiti ketemiteyurie [cite: 5090] kanixiaweni kepauka [cite: 5090], meta kehepai yamitiuyurieniki [cite: 5090], tsepaneti tewi waikawa mitiuka'eniwa yuhepaitsita[cite: 5090]:
'atsikatimaiti kemitiyini hetsienamieme [cite: 5091], xewiti tima pikayiwe para mititaxatianiki[cite: 5091].

Xewiti matsi pumawe tirikariya hexeiyati yu'iyari mukunuitianiki [cite: 5092], meta pumawe tirikariya hexeiyati miminiki hepaitsita[cite: 5092]. Xewitiri pikayiwe mirayukwinetsie meyuta'una [cite: 5093] meta 'axamiti'ane 'axatiyuruwame mutatuani[cite: 5093].
Naimeki mipai nekatiniukaxeiya waikawa netimaimiti kenemitiutiwau nemiretimaniki naime kemiti'ane 'ena kwiepa [cite: 5095]: heiwa tewi xeime miti'aitiakaki kaniyiweni 'axamitiyurieneniki[cite: 5095].

Nekaniwaruxeiyata 'axateyuruwamete memukateukiexia -miki memeutahakekai mewayekikati hakewa Muyepatsietsie- [cite: 5096], mikitsi mekanatimaiyarieni yukiekaritsie hakewa mipai memeyiakai[cite: 5096]. Mikita yaxeikia tixaiti pikatihiki[cite: 5096].
Kepauka xeiya mikataxanetsieni xika 'axatiuyurieni [cite: 5097], 'ana teiteri yu'iyaritsie 'axameteyurieti mekanakinikuni[cite: 5097].

'Axatiyuruwame kaniyiweni xeitsienituyari paimexia 'axamitiuyurieni [cite: 5098], meta miixa wiyari kaniuyeikamiki [cite: 5098], matsi mipaita nekatinimaika [cite: 5098], 'aixia katiniwayuriekamiki kemi'ane Kakaiyari memayemakaxe mariweme me'ayeitiati[cite: 5098].
Matsi 'axateyuruwamete 'aixia pikatiwayurieka [cite: 5103] meta miixa wiyari mepikayurieni[cite: 5103]. Miki 'etiri hepai xeikia mekani'anenekuni [cite: 5103], Kakaiyari memikamakaxeki[cite: 5103].

'Ena kwiepa waikawa katinixuaweni tixaiti katiyunaki'erieti [cite: 5104], teiteri hipati mekanixuaweni 'aixia 'anemeki me'u'uwati [cite: 5104], matsi 'axateyuruwamete wahepai mekani'itiarieka [cite: 5104], meta mepuxuawe 'axateyuruwamete mikita yaxeikia 'aixia mekani'itiarieka 'aixia memitekahu wahepai[cite: 5104]. Neta mipai nekanaineni tixaiti pikarayani[cite: 5105].

'Ayumieme, temawierika nekanexeiyani [cite: 5106], tawari tixaiti pikatixuawe 'aixia miti'ane tewi hetsiemieme hiki tukaritsie [cite: 5106], matsi mitikwakaki [cite: 5106], miranuye'eniki xeikia [cite: 5106], meta yutemawieti [cite: 5106], mipai xeikia 'aixia kani'aneni xika waikawa yu'iyaritiati ti'uximayaka hiki tukaritsie [cite: 5106], Kakaiyari 'ipitiakaku[cite: 5106].
Naimeki yanemiretimaniki mitimaiweniki mi'ayumieme nemitixeiyaki naime kemiti'ane 'ena kwiepa 'uyeikati [cite: 5107], nepikakuwekai tukariki meta tikariki neyu'iyaritiati[cite: 5107].

Naime nekatiniuxeiya tita Kakaiyari mitiutawewi[cite: 5108]. Tewi pikayiwe naime miretimaniki [cite: 5108], Kakaiyari kemitiuyuri 'iki tukaritsie mieme [cite: 5108], tsepaneti xewiti matsi waikawa muyutatua miretimaniki pika'itaxeiya [cite: 5108], tsepaneti xewiti mitimaiwe mipai maine nenepimate [cite: 5108], pikayiwe yamiretimaniki[cite: 5108].

'Iki naimeki waikawa mipai nekatiniyurienekaitini [cite: 5113, 5116], 'ikiki meta naime nekatiniuta'iniata [cite: 5117, 5118], 'aixia memiteyurie meta memitemaiwawe kememite'uximaya [cite: 5118], miki Kakaiyari hetsia katinimiemetini [cite: 5118], tewi 'atsipikatimate kemitiyukanaki'erieka [cite: 5119, 5120] meta kemitiyuka'uxiwe'erie [cite: 5121], tsepa hixiena miti'ane[cite: 5122].

Teyunaiti tekanikukuwemetetini [cite: 5122]: heitseriekameki muyeika meta 'axa'anemiki muyeika [cite: 5123], 'aixia mitiyuriene 'axamitiuka'iyari [cite: 5124], mi'itiya meta mika'itiya [cite: 5125], kemi'aneta mawari miwewie meta kemi'ane mika'iwewie [cite: 5126, 5127], 'aixia mitiuka'iyari 'axatiyuruwame [cite: 5128], kemi'ane tixaitiki mitiyuhiritia meta xewiti mikatiyihiritia[cite: 5129].

Xewiti 'axamitiyurieneniki [cite: 5130, 5131] xeikia kaniuyeikani tukaritsiemieme [cite: 5133, 5134]: 'iki Teyunaiti tsieretsi tekanikwikuni[cite: 5133]. Metatsiere tewi 'iyarieya 'axamiti'aneki kanihineni [cite: 5135], rukuxiya xeikia yu'iyaritsie kanexeiyani yuheyemeki [cite: 5135], 'imatirieka xeikiari kanimimiki[cite: 5135].
Kamitsi ¿kemi'ane rahetsia yapepira'eriwa[cite: 5136]? Yunaiti memayeneniere mekanita'ikwewani [cite: 5136], matsi 'aixia kani'aneni tsiki mayeniereni keyuri maye mikiti[cite: 5137].
Memayeneniere mipai mekatenimaika kename mekwini [cite: 5138], peru mikite 'atsimepikatemate meta tixaiti mepikatetakwewie [cite: 5138], miki yapauka mepatimaiyariwa[cite: 5138].

Kememiteyukanaki'eriekai [cite: 5142], kememite'uyuka'uxiwe'eriekai [cite: 5143], meta kememite'ukaheiwe'eriekai [cite: 5144] mana katiniu'axeni [cite: 5148], meta hatsuaku yamepikateyurieni kememiteyurie 'iki tukaritsie mieme[cite: 5148].
Ketinekwaka 'a'ikwaite pe'atemawieti [cite: 5150], kene'ieka 'awinu yemeki pe'awairiyati [cite: 5150], 'ariri Kakaiyari kaninaki'aka kepemiti'uximayaki[cite: 5150],
Tsieretsi 'akemarite ketuxani meta hatsuaku pikaheuyeweka 'akipatetsie witsimu'ia[cite: 5151].

Kene'atemawieka 'uka penaki'erieti tukariki kepemireutere kepaimexia Kakaiyari metsipitia 'ena kwiepa[cite: 5152]. Xexuime tukaritsie yakixeikia kepemitiyuriene[cite: 5152]. Miki kanihikitini 'ahetsie mitiunakixi kepeti'atatuati pemitiukaxei 'ena kwiepa[cite: 5153].

Naiti 'ahetsie miti'axe 'aixia 'anemeki yaketineuyuri [cite: 5154], hakewa pemekateukieni [cite: 5154], mana mikahexuaweki 'uximayatsika [cite: 5154], kepemiti'atukaritiani meta tita pemitiuyemate meta kepemitimaiwe piremaweni[cite: 5154].

Nepune'iwiyaxita 'ena kwiepa memanautsawawe xeikia mepikatehayu'iwa [cite: 5158], meta mepikatehayu'iwa xeikia waikawa memiyiwawe [cite: 5158], metatsiere memitemaiwawe xeikia mepikate'utikwa'ani [cite: 5158], meta memitemateta tumini waikawa mepikahexeiya [cite: 5158], meta memite'uyemate mepikayutemamawie 'aixia metexeiyarieti [cite: 5158], matsi pita yunaiti wahetsie kani'axeni tukarite 'aixia 'aneneti meta 'axa'aneneti[cite: 5158].

Mipaita netinetimani xewiti 'atsipikatimate kepauka tukarieya maye'ani[cite: 5162]. Ketsite kememitekuwiniyariwa wipi 'axa'anemetsie meta wikixi winiyaritsie mekaniuyewiwireni [cite: 5163], yaxeikiata teiteri mekaniwiniyarieka mipai memikateha'eriwanitsie katinaye'axeni wahetsie xeimieme[cite: 5163].
Tawarita xeime nekanetimani kwiepa nekaratimaiyati mipai mitimaiwekaiki[cite: 5164]:

kiekari 'etsiyeukame [cite: 5165], teiteri yaki meyupaumeti memakuteitsie [cite: 5165], xewiti ti'aitame tirikaiyeti mana kaneutahani 'e'iwake [cite: 5165], waritana 'imumii 'ematayewa mekaniutawewieni memuwara'iwaki[cite: 5165].

Miki kiekariitsie tewi mana kaniukateitini [cite: 5166], tixaiti karexeiyati matsi xeikia pitimaiwekai [cite: 5166], kemitimaiwekaiki kaniyiwekaitini kiekari mutawikweitsitianiki [cite: 5166], xewiti tima pikaheye'eri miki tewi tixaiti mikarexeiyakaiki[cite: 5166].

Ne mipai nepaine <matsi peuyewetse mirakumaika keyuri tirikaiyeti» [cite: 5167], tsepa kepauka mu'uxiwe'eriwa 'iya tewi mitimaiweki tixaiti karexeiyati [cite: 5167], meta xika niukieya ka'u'enierieni[cite: 5167].
Mitimaiwe niukieya matsi kaneuyeweka kayuwati mi'enierieka [cite: 5168], keyuri 'atsimemikatemate tiwa'aitiwame 'utahiwakaku[cite: 5169].
Kaneuyeweka matsi waikawa mitimaiweniki [cite: 5170], keyuri tituaxame kuyaxa mieme[cite: 5170]. Xeimeki 'axaxikapetiuyurieni [cite: 5171] pekatinitixitiamiki 'aixia miti'ane[cite: 5172].

Xaipitsi memikwikwi'i 'axamekaniu'iatikani [cite: 5178], tita witsimitiu'ia katinanuyeitiwani[cite: 5179]. Mipai katinimatsiikini xika 'etsiwa mikayikihiawe pe'ayani [cite: 5180], matsi 'atsimikatimate yu'iyaritsie [cite: 5184], pikayiwe muyutaxewire mitimaiweniki meta 'aixia mitixeiyariekaki[cite: 5182, 5183].
Mitimaiwe katinikuwauneni tita 'aixia miti'ane katinikuwauneni 'axamiti'ane[cite: 5186, 5187, 5188].
Meta huye'utia kemitimie 'atsimikatimate waikawa katineiyehiaka miretimaniki [cite: 5189], 'anari yunaiti mipai mekatenetimaikuni kename 'atsikatimate[cite: 5189].
Xika ti'aitame 'uyeha'ani 'ahepaitsita [cite: 5190], pepika'iku'e'eiriwani ketitaki pemitihiritiarie[cite: 5190]. Petiukanewieti waikawa 'axapemitiuyuriki kani'ayumiemetini[cite: 5190].
Xewiti kanixuaweni tita 'axamiti'ane [cite: 5191], te'aitamete meheuyexiriweti kememiteyurie hepai tiyuxexeiyati[cite: 5192]:
'atsimikatimate katinihiritiarieka [cite: 5193, 5194] matsi waikawa timamariwawemeki [cite: 5196, 5197], peru memiyiwawe matsi 'etsiwa xeikia mekatenihiritiarieka[cite: 5198, 5199].

Nekaniwaxeiyanita wairiyarika te'uximayatamete kawayutsixi wahetsie mekaniuteni te'aitamete wahepai [cite: 5201, 5202, 5203], teiterita tewa'aitiwamete yu'ikama mekaniku'uwani wairiyarika te'uximayatamete wahepai[cite: 5204, 5205].
Putsu xika 'utawewieni [cite: 5206], muwa kaneukawemiki[cite: 5207]. Kemi'ane 'ixumeri hixiata 'akame mita'una [cite: 5211], kuu kanikeimiki[cite: 5212].
Xika tetexi pe'utitara [cite: 5213], miki tetexi kametinikwinitiamiki[cite: 5214]. Kemi'ane kiye mawiteni [cite: 5215], miki kiyexiki katiniyukwinitiaka[cite: 5216].

Hatsa xika ka'ataxikaunini [cite: 5217], meta xika ka'etamiani [cite: 5218], matsi karima katinewitekemiki[cite: 5218]. Xika petimaimikini ketine'uximayaka 'aixia 'anekameki [cite: 5219], petimaiti meta 'aixia peti'a'iwiyati[cite: 5221].
Xika kuu tiuyukeni meri 'akuxi kwikariki kakewaiyarieweti [cite: 5222], tixaiti pikara'iwa 'ikewaiyame[cite: 5223].
Kepauka mitimaiwe mitiwakuxaxatiwa [cite: 5224], teiteri 'aixia 'anemeki mekani'enieka [cite: 5225], matsi kepaukata 'atsimikatimate mitikuxata [cite: 5226], miki xeikia kaniwaka'unani[cite: 5226].
Matiari mieme niukieya tixaiti pikatihiki [cite: 5227], 'imatirieka 'aixia pikatinini 'atsimikatimateki[cite: 5228].
Matsi xewiti pikayiwe yamitayiniki[cite: 5229]. Xewiti pikatimate kemitiyini [cite: 5230], meta 'arikeke kemiyini [cite: 5230], xewiti pikayiwe yamitayiniki[cite: 5231].
Mika'uka'iyari kemiti'uximaya yaki xeikia katiniyu'uxitiaka [cite: 5232], meta kiekari huyeyari 'utima pikahemarie[cite: 5233].
Xia'ui kiekari ti'aitame mikatseiye mira'aitatsie [cite: 5237], meta tewa'aitiwamete ximeri paiti mekanayatsariwani memitekwaniki[cite: 5238, 5239, 5241, 5242].

Matsi witsikatinikihiawariwani kemi'ane kiekaritsie ti'aitame 'aixia miti'uximaya [cite: 5244, 5246], meta te'aitamete kepauka memitekwa'a mauyewetsetsie [cite: 5247, 5248], waikawa memititirikaxianiki memitariwekaki pikatixai[cite: 5249, 5250, 5251].
Miyu'iraxie kiiya heima kananuka'unikeni [cite: 5252], mikatikumaiwa kiiya kaniuhayeweni[cite: 5253].
Paa kwati kaniutanawemiki [cite: 5254], winu'ieti kaniyutemawiekamiki [cite: 5256], tuminita mitixitianiki kani'ayumiemetini[cite: 5256].

Ti'aitame 'axapepikatikumamateni [cite: 5257], meta 'axapepikatiku'eriyani [cite: 5258], meta mixiku 'awie 'axapepikarahiaweni [cite: 5259], wikixi muyuawitsie miemete mekaniyiwaweni niuki memenitikirieniki[cite: 5260, 5261]. Mekaniu'anani mekaniyiwaweni memite'itaxatianiki[cite: 5262, 5263, 5264].
Hata keneukahiwa 'apaa [cite: 5266], yapaimexia tukari 'anukayayu 'ana keta pekanitaxeiyamiki[cite: 5267].
Me'atahutame yatini me'atahaikame ketiniwarumikwa tita pemirexeiya [cite: 5268, 5272], 'atsipemikatimateki tita 'uximatiarikayari 'umiramie 'ena kwiepa[cite: 5272].

Haiwitiri kepauka mayemanenitsie [cite: 5273], kwiepa wiyeri kanikaxiriemiki[cite: 5273]. Kiye xika tatsutia hataweni [cite: 5274], yatini tayeta [cite: 5275], hakewa meutaweni kaniyuhayewamiki [cite: 5276, 5278] mana[cite: 5279].
Kemi'ane 'eka xeikia mitaxeiya [cite: 5280], pika'uka'etsa [cite: 5280], kemi'aneta haiwitiri xeikia mitaxeiya mikita pika'uka'itsana[cite: 5280].

Mipai 'atsipemikatimateki ki 'eka kemireumie [cite: 5281], meta kehepai memitekununuiwa tiri yumamama wahukatsie [cite: 5281], yaxeikiata Kakaiyari 'uximayatsikaya pepika'enie naime mitiutiwewi[cite: 5281].

Ximeri paiti 'a'imiari keneuka'etsa [cite: 5282], taikaita 'uxipiya pepikahexeiyani [cite: 5282], matsi 'atsipepikatimate ke'aneti 'etsiyari 'aixia mitiyini [cite: 5282], xika 'iya yatini 'iki, yamatsi naiti 'aixia 'aneneti pirayani[cite: 5282].
Hekiariya witsikani'aneni [cite: 5283], 'aixiata kani'aneni tau hekiariyayari xeiyati 'amuyeikani[cite: 5283].

Xika tewi matsi miixa wiyari 'a'uyeikani hetsiena yutemawieti [cite: 5284], matsi tukari tekeha'eriwani 'uximatiarika mitixuaweretsie waikawa katiniyimiki [cite: 5284], meta tita 'umiramie 'ana yaki xeikia pikarayani[cite: 5284].

Hiki kene'atemawieka mexi petemaiki [cite: 5286], 'a'iyari keneupitia miyutemawiekaki[cite: 5286]. Kemitiku'eriwa keneyeweiyani meta 'ahixiteki kepemitiuyukahiwe'erie [cite: 5290], matsi kena'eriwani Kakaiyari miki naimeki kamenita'iwawiyamiki[cite: 5290].
'A'iyaritsie haxia pepikapitiaka [cite: 5291], 'ahetsie tita 'axamiti'ane ketinayeweiya [cite: 5291], matsi temaiki yu'erieti meta temaikiyari yakixeikia kanihikitini[cite: 5291].
Kemi'ane matsi'utawewi kena'eriwani [cite: 5292], hikiri pemitemaiki [cite: 5293], mexineti tukari 'axami'ane ka'aye'awe[cite: 5293].

Kepauka mipai pemitayini [cite: 5295]: <<Pikanetsinakeri 'anemuyeikaniki miixa wiyari» [cite: 5296], matsi'utawewi mehekiariwie kena'eriwani [cite: 5299, 5300] tau meta hekiariya xuawe [cite: 5301], metseri meta xurawetsixi mehekiariwie [cite: 5302], mexineti meta mexi haiwitiri 'anuku'eke kepauka wiyeri mititahayewatsie[cite: 5303, 5304, 5305].

Tukari Kanaye'amiki kepauka kii hiwemete memitiyiyiaka marikaki [cite: 5306, 5307], mekananakatutsirikuni yukukuyamete [cite: 5308], 'anari mekatenihayewakuni memikayumiireniki [cite: 5309, 5310], tiximete 'anarita mepikaneniereni [cite: 5311], 'itupari 'etsi mayeyeutsie memaneniere[cite: 5312, 5313].

Katinaunaririmemiki kitenie kaye 'utia mieme [cite: 5314], 'anari kananukanuaximemiki yuariyaya [cite: 5315, 5316], wikixi yukwikari mekananukuhanikuni [cite: 5317], murina matsi wakwikari pitikini puka'enierieka[cite: 5318, 5319].

Marika Kanitixuawerimiki hirite 'amanutitititsie [cite: 5320], 'anarita huyeta kaniumariwemiki[cite: 5321]. 'Arimenitira meta 'ana kanitixutuimiki [cite: 5324], 'utsikari mekani'axiakuni yumiireti [cite: 5325], mekanikakimikuni 'anari tixaiti tiyutewi kaniyemieni kiekari 'emititeriwetsie [cite: 5327, 5328], kaye'utia mekaniyexirietiwekuni [cite: 5329], meyuhiwerieti 'akaxari mexeiyati [cite: 5329], tixaiti tiyu- naki'erieti pika'ayani[cite: 5326].

Kena'eriwani kemi'ane matsi'utawewi [cite: 5331], mexi katatsaniwe pirata hiiyameyari [cite: 5332], meta mexi katatariwe huru xariyari [cite: 5332], meta xari haa manakaxiriwetsie katitawaxiawe [cite: 5332], tsikiririiya katitarixiawawe putsuta miireti ka'ayeiwe[cite: 5332].
'Anari kwiepa tumuanari kanayeimiki [cite: 5333], meripaiti mi'anekai hepai [cite: 5333], 'iyari kanakunuamiki Kakaiyari hetsia [cite: 5334], miki mana meiyeni'aki[cite: 5334].
Ti'ikitame mipai nekanaineni [cite: 5335]: 'iki tukari tixaiti pikarexeiya [cite: 5336], naiti 'axakatini'aneni[cite: 5336].

Matsi waikawa timaiweti [cite: 5338], ti'ikitame teiteri katiniwarutaxatiani naime ketita miretima[cite: 5338]. Miki naime katineutixeiyaxiani yumarima [cite: 5339], miireme temaiwawemete kememite'u'ixatsita waxapa kanayeitiani[cite: 5339].
Tsiepire hipame niukite kaniutaxeiya 'aixia 'anuyitikaime [cite: 5340], mikita kaniti'utiani yumarima yuri maineki[cite: 5340].
Memitemaiwawe waniuki tiyutseweme hepai kani'aneneni[cite: 5341]. Kirapuxite 'aixia miretsunini hepai mekatenikuxatani [cite: 5341], xewiti xeikia tixaxatame tiwakuxaxatiwakaku[cite: 5344].

Ne matsi miki hepaitsita nematsihaye'eritiwa 'eki neniwe nematsinaki'erie [cite: 5345], waikawa xapate xika'utiwewieni pikayinirinia [cite: 5345], meta pe'ititeriwa pekaniti'uximiki waikawa[cite: 5345].
'Imatiarieka 'iki niuki naiti kaniu'enierieni[cite: 5347]. Kakaiyari matsi kenayemakaxeni [cite: 5347], yaketinekamieni 'aitsikayatsie [cite: 5347], 'iki naiti tewi hetsie kanimiemetini[cite: 5347].
Uximayatsika matsi, 'axami'anene meta 'aixiami'ane meta 'awie ketemiteyurie Kakaiyari naime kanita'iwaumiki[cite: 5348].
